  def move(self):
    print("walking... ")

class Bat(Mammal):
  def move(self):
    print("flying... ")

class Human(Mammal):
  def do_something(self):
    print("discovering fire!")

animal1 = Mammal()
animal2 = Bat()
animal3 = Human()

animal1.move()
animal2.move()
animal3.move()
animal3.do_something()

>>> walking... 
>>> flying... 
>>> walking... 
>>> discovering fire!
